subject: Team Meeting Tomorrow
body: Hi team, just a reminder about our team meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. We'll discuss Q4 planning and the new project roadmap. Please review the deck I sent earlier. Thanks!

subject: Budget Review - Action Required
body: Hi, I need your input on the Q4 budget proposal. Can we schedule a call this week? The deadline is Friday. Let me know your availability.

subject: Project Alpha Update
body: Quick update on Project Alpha: we've completed phase 1 testing and found 3 minor bugs. The team is working on fixes. Expected completion is next Monday. No blockers at the moment.

subject: November 4th Meeting Confirmation
body: Confirming our meeting on November 4th at 10:00 AM in Conference Room B. We'll discuss the new API endpoints and integration strategy. Duration: 1 hour. Attendees: you, me, and the engineering team.

subject: Lunch Meeting Request
body: Would you be available for lunch on Thursday to discuss the marketing campaign? I'm flexible on time, anywhere between 12-2 PM works for me.
